name: Bidoof
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon’s attack’s. That Pokémon can’t use that attack during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Scavenge
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, an put it into your hand.
